description.content: OpenAPI Specification for the Binance Sub Account REST API

exec: // only sign if a signature param was declared and we have a secret
const cryptoKey = await crypto.subtle.importKey('raw', keyData, { name: 'HMAC', hash: 'SHA-256' }, false, ['sign']);
const signatureBuffer = await crypto.subtle.sign('HMAC', cryptoKey, msgData);

item.name: Managed-Sub-Account
Query Managed Sub-account Snapshot (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Query Managed Sub-account Asset Details (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Deposit Assets Into The Managed Sub-account (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Get Managed Sub-account Deposit Address (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Query Managed Sub-account Futures Asset Details (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: No input or input "MARGIN" to get Cross Margin account details. Input "ISOLATED_MARGIN" to get Isolated Margin account details.

item.name: Query Managed Sub-account List (For Investor) (USER_DATA)
Query Managed Sub-account Margin Asset Details (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: No input or input "MARGIN" to get Cross Margin account details. Input "ISOLATED_MARGIN" to get Isolated Margin account details.

item.name: Query Managed Sub Account Transfer Log (For Trading Team Sub Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: End Time (The start time and end time interval cannot exceed half a year)

item.name: Query Managed Sub Account Transfer Log (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: End Time (The start time and end time interval cannot exceed half a year)

item.name: Query Managed Sub Account Transfer Log (For Trading Team Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: End Time (The start time and end time interval cannot exceed half a year)

item.name: Withdrawl Assets From The Managed Sub-account (For Investor Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: Withdrawals is automatically occur on the transfer date(UTC0). If a date is not selected, the withdrawal occurs right now

item.name: Asset-Management
Get Sub-account Deposit Address (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Get Sub-account Deposit History (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: 0(0:pending,6: credited but cannot withdraw,7:Wrong Deposit,8:Waiting User confirm,1:success)

item.name: Get Detail on Sub-account's Futures Account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Get Summary of Sub-account's Futures Account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Query Sub-account Futures Asset Transfer History (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Sub-account Futures Asset Transfer (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Get Move Position History for Sub-account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Move Position for Sub-account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: Max 10 positions supported. When input request parameter,orderArgs.symbol should be STRING, orderArgs.quantity should be BIGDECIMAL, and orderArgs.positionSide should be STRING, positionSide support BOTH,LONG and SHORT. Each entry should be like orderArgs[0].symbol=BTCUSDT,orderArgs[0].quantity=0.001,orderArgs[0].positionSide=BOTH. Example of the request parameter array: orderArgs[0].symbol=BTCUSDT orderArgs[0].quantity=0.001 orderArgs[0].positionSide=BOTH orderArgs[1].symbol=ETHUSDT orderArgs[1].quantity=0.01 orderArgs[1].positionSide=BOTH

item.name: Futures Transfer for Sub-account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: 1: transfer from subaccount's  spot account to margin account 2: transfer from subaccount's margin account to its spot account

item.name: Get Detail on Sub-account's Margin Account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Get Summary of Sub-account's Margin Account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Margin Transfer for Sub-account (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: 1: transfer from subaccount's  spot account to margin account 2: transfer from subaccount's margin account to its spot account

Transfer to Master (For Sub-account) (USER_DATA)
Transfer to Sub-account of Same Master (For Sub-account) (USER_DATA)
Sub-account Transfer History (For Sub-account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: If not sent, result of all assets will be returned
Default `False`, return PROCESS and SUCCESS status history; If `True`,return PROCESS and SUCCESS and FAILURE status history

Api-Management
Get IP Restriction for a Sub-account API Key (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)
Delete IP List For a Sub-account API Key (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: IPs to be deleted. Can be added in batches, separated by commas

item.name: Add IP Restriction for Sub-Account API key (For Master Account) (USER_DATA)

query.description: IP Restriction status. 1 = IP Unrestricted. 2 = Restrict access to trusted IPs only.
Insert static IP in batch, separated by commas.
